metadata.name: Hidden Portrait Expressions Beyond Time #1/10
metadata.description:
Buckle up, settle into your seat, and press play on the remote! Because this NFT offers you an adventure full of past masterpieces within the television!
If you're interested in history and love art, then this NFT is perfect for you! The famous portrait paintings inside the television will transport you to the past and allow you to rediscover the art of that era. So, get ready to be taken back in time! But first, don't forget to buckle up, because this journey might be a little bumpy!

---
By Enes Sagdic
